channel.title: About on We care about Creekside
channel.description: Recent content in About on We care about Creekside

item.title: Location
item.description: This railyard operation maintenance facility (ROMF) is planned for an industrial site at the intersection of Ephesus Church and Farrington Roads, less than 0.25 miles away from Creekside Elementary. On December 3, 2018, the Durham City Council approved an industrial rezoning for this location. The nearest industrial zone in Durham is over 4 miles away in Research Triangle Park.
